  • Available in variety of colors, each sold seperate
  • Full Bolt is 10 yards

data.name: Tonal Tie Dye Blizzard Fleece Fabric
data.description:
Wrap yourself in the cozy embrace of our Tonal Tie Dye Blizzard Fleece Fabric. Soft to the touch and imbued with warmth, it's the ultimate fabric for crafting snug blankets, jackets, and other cold-weather essentials. Rendered in a stylish tonal tie-dye pattern, this fabric is sure to add a dash of contemporary chic to your creations. Made from 100% polyester, it promises durability and resilience, while its plush texture makes it an excellent pick for no-sew projects. Its versatile 59-inch width offers ample space for various designs. Not just limited to personal projects, its varied color options also make it suitable for crafting gifts or items for charitable donations. The fabric is also easy to maintain and machine-washable.

  • Width: 59 inches
  • Content: 100% Polyester
  • Care: Machine wash normal separately cold, non-chlorine bleach, tumble dry low, remove quickly, cool iron
  • Imported

data.description:
Indulge in the Delicious Comfort of Pepperoni Heart Pizza on Blue Blizzard Fleece Fabric

There's nothing quite like the comfort of a warm, cozy blanket on a chilly night. And what could be more comforting than snuggling up with a slice of pepperoni heart pizza on a soft and plush blue blizzard fleece fabric? This fabric is perfect for creating blankets, throws, and other cozy items that will keep you warm and remind you of your favorite comfort food.

Not only is this fabric incredibly soft and comfortable, but it's also easy to care for. Simply machine wash it on a normal cold cycle, use nonchlorine bleach if needed, and tumble dry on low. And with a width of 58", you'll have plenty of fabric to work with for all of your cozy creations.

Product Details
